contentrichtext.text: '''Nzinga''' may refer to: ==People== *[[Nzinga of Ndongo and Matamba]] (c. 1583–1663), West African warrior queen *[[João I of Kongo]], also known as Nzinga a Nkuwu or Nkuwu Nzinga *[[Afonso I of Kongo]] (c. 1456–1542 or 1543), also known as Mvemba a Nzinga or Nzinga Mbemba *[[Nzinga Blake]] (born 1981), American/Sierra Leonean actress *[[Daniel Ntongi-Nzinga]] (born 1946), peace activist and Christian leader in Angola ==Places== *[[Nzinga, Nyanga, Gabon]], in [[Nyanga Province]] *[[Nzinga, Ogooué-Ivindo, Gabon]], in the province of [[Ogooué-Ivindo]] *[[Nzinga, Central African Republic]], a [[Transport in the Central African Republic#Ports and harbors|port in the Central African Republic]] *[[Nzinga Tchi]], in [[Nyanga Province]], Gabon {{Disambiguation|geo|given name|surname}}
